scripts.tag:cambridge: git checkout tags/cambridge-2022 && yarn && yarn run build && mv build cambridge-2022&& git checkout main
scripts.tag:buenos-aires: git checkout tags/buenos-aires-2023 && yarn && yarn run build && mv build buenos-aires-2023 && git checkout main
scripts.tag:berkeley: git checkout tags/berkeley-2023 && yarn && yarn run build && mv build berkeley-2023 && git checkout main
scripts.tag:hong-kong: git checkout tags/hong-kong-2024 && yarn && yarn run build && mv build hong-kong-2024 && git checkout main
scripts.tag:current: git checkout main && yarn && yarn run build:all && mv build current
scripts.move-tags: git checkout main && mv cambridge-2022 build && mv buenos-aires-2023 build && mv berkeley-2023 build && mv hong-kong-2024 build && mv current build
scripts.prepare-deployment: git fetch --tags && yarn run clean && yarn run tag:cambridge && yarn run tag:buenos-aires && yarn run tag:berkeley && yarn run tag:hong-kong && yarn run tag:current && mkdir build && yarn run move-tags && yarn run move-frontpage
scripts.mod-links:
MOD_NUMBER=$0; find syllabus/ -path syllabus/${MOD_NUMBER}\*.md -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 markdown-link-check -c .github/workflows/mlc_config.json && echo "
Check complete for mod"
scripts.build:all: yarn run build && yarn run build:agenda && cp -R dist/* build/.
